metadata.title: Wednesday, 15th March, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) why the rehabilitation of the Isoka-Mafinga road in Isoka Parliamentary Constituency has stalled;
(b) when the project will resume; and
(c) how much money the contractor was owed, as of June, 2022.
(a) how many general hospitals there were, countrywide, as of December, 2021;
(b) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade some hospitals to general hospital level; and
(c) if so, how many hospitals are earmarked for upgrading, countrywide.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of Chembe Boarding Secondary School in Chembe District will be completed;
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is;
(c) at what level of completion, in percentage terms, the project was, as of March, 2022; and

(d) what the cost of the outstanding works on the project was, as of March, 2022. NOTICE OF MOTION Mr Chibombwe Restrict Auction of Public Assets to Zambians:  That this House urges the Government to restrict auctioning of public assets to Zambians only. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Thanks – His Excellency the President’s Address – Motion (28th February) –  Resumption of Debate. ____________________________
